page.title: 10Transport in Langtoft
page.content: The Langtoft bus service is poor.The bus that does come through comes at 9.36 and comes back at 12.19 in the week.On Saturday the bus comes at 9.36 and comes back at 12.59. The route the bus takes is from Driffield to Langtoft to Bridlington.The head office is at Hull. On weekdays it doesnt go to Bridlington.There is a depot at Hull and Bridlington.{About {half of the population of Langtoft {don't use the bus.}A third of the people use the bus and 11 people use it sometimes.Most of the people say that there should be a better bus service.{The ownership of cars} is high.About 75% of the people in Langtoft have a car. There is also a private {Coach Company called Revills in the village.
